About Me

I am a Computer Science student and an aspiring Backend Developer specializing in C# and .NET technologies. I have a strong foundation in C++ (OOP & Functional Programming), Data Structures, and Database Management (SQL Server).

Currently learning Angular for frontend development to complement my backend expertise. Through hands-on projects, I gained experience in building maintainable backend systems, implementing clean code practices, and working with real-world scenarios.
